item.description:
Pub night on a Saturday night!

We'll meet at the outdoor bar (all the way in the back.)
- a cool Tiki Bar environment!

I made a reservation under my name due to the great turn out - Lonnie.

With a table reservation we should order food with drinks -drinks never a problem : ) - arrive hungry and thirsty as close to 7:30 as possible.

Please keep your RSVP current - deadline July 10, 2009 - 4PM. due to reservation purposes.
Feel free to text or call me if you are running late or planning to join us later.

We can make our way down to other bars if our group feels like a Pub crawl...

What better way to enjoy a summer night than having food & drinks with new friends?

*If there are any changes to event by Saturday I will email/post by noon, so watch the site.
If you want to attend and we are at maximum email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at outdoor bar area - all the way in the back - Reservation is under Lonnie -. 401-829-8516.
item.name: Pub Night - Saturday Night - Salvation Cafe - Great Food/Great Drinks
